argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fvmptg.1 | |- ( x = A -> B = C ) |
| 2 |  | fvmptg.2 | |- F = ( x e. D |-> B ) |
| 3 |  | fvmpt.3 | |- C e. _V |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_fvmptg | |- ( ( A e. D /\ C e. _V ) -> ( F ` A ) = C ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A e. D -> ( F ` A ) = C ) |
